NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
3
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Radio Station KUOM
,.\ University of Minnesota
Minneapolis lip, Minnesota
August 1, 1957
Mr. Prank E. Schooley
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Prank:
Thank you for your letter of July 29 and its enclosures,
relative to the assignment of John Weiss to ETV responsibility
in the Pord Foundation.
I am dropping him a brief note in this mail, referring to
his new assignment, and identifying you as chairman of the
Foundation Committee through which our fund negotiations with
the Foundation are carried out (which fact, of course, he
already knows).
I shall keep confidential the information in your letter
relative to the fact that we can probably keep and carry over
unused balances, and that the outlook for long range help is
good. This, of course, is excellent news.
I hope that Faust can speak at the NAEB banquet.
I hope you and your family have a good vacation. I expect
to take mine at a ranch in Oregon, driving out by way of the
Black Hills and Yellowstone Park, and returning via Glacier.
Yc^urs sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
